comments.author: tnikkel@gmail.com
comments.text:
Goto http://maps.google.com. Enter "toronto to montreal" in the search box and press enter. In the sidebar on the left paste "Amherst, UMass, Smith College, Mt. Holyoke College, and Hampshire College" into the textbox with the "B" beside it. Press home. Hold down delete. Before everything gets deleted the cursor moves to the end of the text in textbox.

This happens in Firefox 3.6 and the latest nightly.

comments.author: bogdan.maris@softvision.com
comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:23.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/23.0

Still reproduced on latest Nightly (buildID: 20130716030202), latest Aurora (buildID: 20130716004006), Firefox 4.0 (buildID: 20110318052756), Firefox 23 beta 6 (buildID: 20130715155216) so it`s safe to say that this is not a regression.
